response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. Given its high value and exceptional quality, we believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth to you is $12,000, we're offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is an opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a price that's significantly below its market value. We hope this aligns with your expectations and budget. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 10000}
